alert.note: Alert for Challis, Pahsimeroi Valleys; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 4:08AM MST until January 12 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 5 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Lost River Valley/Range-Challis/Pahsimeroi Valleys- Including the cities of Howe, Arco, Mackay, Chilly, Borah Peak, and Challis . * WHEN...From 5 PM this afternoon to 5 PM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Areas of blowing and drifting snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or by visiting 511.idaho.gov.

area.areaDesc: Challis, Pahsimeroi Valleys; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys
